title: Activate an article model
content:
Note You must have the appropriate permissions to be able to activate an article model.

To activate an article model means changing its status, as shown in the workflow snapshot at the top of the model, from draft to active.

  1. From the main menu, select Build > Knowledge > Models.

  2. Select the article model.

    Click the record identifier in the ID column to display the selected record.

  3. Click Active, then Save.

Related topics

  • How to create an article model
  • How to edit an article model
  • How to retire an article model
